resources.string:
Documenter v%s
\n https://github.com/ViliusSutkus89/Documenter
\n
\n Reference implementation application of pdf2htmlEX-Android and wvWare-Android
\n

pdf2htmlEX-Android v%s
\n https://github.com/ViliusSutkus89/pdf2htmlEX-Android
\n
\n
Android port of pdf2htmlEX
\n https://github.com/pdf2htmlEX/pdf2htmlEX
\n
Convert PDF to HTML without losing text or format
\n

wvWare-Android v%s
\n https://github.com/ViliusSutkus89/wvWare-Android
\n
\n
Android port of wvWare
\n http://wvware.sourceforge.net
\n
Library to load and parse Word 2000, 97, 95 and 6 files
\n
Notification channel used to notify user about currently active pdf/doc conversion process
